Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Administration
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("autobanrole", "Allows you to set or remove a role from autobanning a user when they add it.")]
public class SlashAdministration.SlashAutoBanRole : MewdekoSlashSubmodule<AutoBanRoleService>, IInteractionModuleBase
